methods.name: ConnectDefaultOuputToInput
ConnectOuputToInputByIndex
ConnectOuputToInputByName
GatherInputs
methods.doc: Retrieves the names of all the inputs for a given node.

methods.name: GetInputConnection
methods.doc: Retrieves the node unique id and the output name connected to a given input, if any.

methods.name: HasInput
methods.doc: Checks whether a particular input exists on a given node.

methods.name: HasParameter
methods.doc: Checks whether a particular input exists as a parameter on a given node.

methods.name: IsAnInput
methods.doc: Returns true if the attribute key is associated with an input (starts with "Inputs:").

methods.name: IsAParameter
methods.doc: Returns true if the attribute key is an input that represents parameters (ends with ":Parameter").

methods.name: MakeInputConnectionKey
methods.doc: Makes an attribute key to represent a node being connected to an input (that is, Inputs:InputName:Connect).

methods.name: MakeInputName
methods.doc: From an attribute key associated with an input (that is, Inputs:InputName:Value), retrieves the input name.

methods.name: MakeInputParameterKey
methods.doc:
Makes an attribute key to represent a parameter being given to an input (that is, Inputs:InputName:Parameter).
This is more relevant to Materials, but could be used to differentiate between constant values and parameters.

methods.name: MakeInputValueKey
methods.doc: Makes an attribute key to represent a value being given to an input (that is, Inputs:InputName:Value).
